com.lavanya.web.controller

Class FriendController

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.lavanya.web.controller.FriendController

  • @Controller
public class FriendController
extends java.lang.Object
    Controller used in MVC architecture to control all the requests related to Friend object.

    • Method Detail

      • sendRequestForFriendInvitation

        @PostMapping(value="/request/friend")
public java.lang.String sendRequestForFriendInvitation(@ModelAttribute(value="userInvitedId")
                                                                                              java.util.UUID userInvitedId,
                                                                                              javax.servlet.http.HttpSession session)
        POST requests for /request/friend endpoint. This controller-method is used to send notification to another user to be part of friends list.
        Parameters:
        userInvitedId - is the id of the user profile visited by the user connected.
        session - a HttpSession where attributes of interest are stored, here it concerns the token generated following user connection.
        Returns:
        userProfileToVisit.html

      • showlistOfFriendsByUser

        @GetMapping(value="/user/friends")
public java.lang.String showlistOfFriendsByUser(javax.servlet.http.HttpSession session,
                                                                                    org.springframework.ui.Model model)
        GET requests for /user/friends endpoint. This controller-method retrieves from database all friends requests made or received by user and not accepted yet and displays all friends of the suer connected.
        Parameters:
        model - to pass data to the view.
        session - a HttpSession where attributes of interest are stored, here it concerns the token generated following user connection.
        Returns:
        friendsDashboard.html

      • acceptFriendRequest

        @PostMapping(value="/request/response")
public java.lang.String acceptFriendRequest(javax.servlet.http.HttpSession session,
                                                                                     @ModelAttribute(value="id")
                                                                                     int id)
        POST requests for /request/response endpoint. This controller-method is used to accept a friend request by updating isAccepted attribute of Friend object.
        Parameters:
        id - of the Friend object to accept.
        session - a HttpSession where attributes of interest are stored, here it concerns the token generated following user connection.
        Returns:
        friendsDashboard.html

      • refuseFriendRequest

        @PostMapping(value="/delete/request")
public java.lang.String refuseFriendRequest(@ModelAttribute(value="id")
                                                                                   int id,
                                                                                   javax.servlet.http.HttpSession session)
        POST requests for /delete/request endpoint. This controller-method is part of CRUD and is used to delete in database Friend object.
        Parameters:
        id - of the Friend object to delete.
        session - a HttpSession where attributes of interest are stored, here it concerns the token generated following user connection.
        Returns:
        friendsDashboard.html
